ygData.subject: RE: Some Questions
ygData.msgSnippet: 1) Foremans tunic, hands down 2) Goblin camp in Dagnors Cauldron outside unrest...very rarely camped...get with agroup there you can sell at the island...the
ygData.messageBody:
1) Foremans tunic, hands down
2) Goblin camp in Dagnors Cauldron outside unrest...very rarely camped...get
with agroup there you can sell at the island...the only thing people want
from here is the cauldron shells and water rings off of the tidal
lords...most people than want them will let you kill the goblins if you let
them loot any of them lords that have either the ring or the shell..we
usually shout "ring at goblin camp" and people come a runnin. This should
take you to level 24...or you can kill yard trash inside the often trained
unrest.
3)Hammeron Beerdowner
Hammeron Smackmaster
Hammeron Nails
names are fun

-----Original Message-----
From: Worlord [mailto:worlord99@...]
Sent: Saturday, November 27, 1999 11:01 AM
To: EQ-Monks@onelist.com
Subject: [EQ-Monks] Some Questions


From: Worlord <worlord99@...>

I recently aquired the level 20 on my monk. I have
some questions.

1) I managed to buy some Cured Silk Armor for a
relativily low price. So my choice is between Cured
Silk Gi or Foreman's tunic. Any input?

2) Where is a good place for a level 20 to hunt.
From 14-17 I hunted oasis and from 17-20 I hunted East
Karana. Any recomendations?

3) Anyone know a good surname for a Monk named
Hammeron


Hammeron
Monk of Quellious
